title: One dead, one injured after shooting at the Tampa Hotel, police searching for 5 men
content:
Autoplay:Digital Short: Shooting at Tampa hotel under investigationCONNECTING...XOne killed in shooting
TAMPA, Fla. - Police are investigating a deadly shooting in Tampa.
The shooting occurred in the parking lot of the Tampa Hotel (formerly the Red Roof Inn) at 2307 East Busch Blvd around 3:30 p.m. on Sunday.
According to police, one person died and other person was transported to the hospital with injuries that are not considered life threatening.
Police arrested Leroy Livingston Johnson for murder in the second degree with a firearm and attempted murder in the second degree with a firearm.
The victim has been identified as Kelly Evander Stacy Jr.
